task_cookie_config.create_time,

values

mapper.update:
update task_cookie_config
task_cookie_config.create_time = #{createTime},
task_cookie_config.domain_id = #{domainId},
task_cookie_config.expiration = #{expiration},
task_cookie_config.key = #{key},
task_cookie_config.task_config_main_id = #{taskConfigMainId},
task_cookie_config.value = #{value}
task_cookie_config.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select task_cookie_config.create_time, task_cookie_config.domain_id, task_cookie_config.expiration, task_cookie_config.id, task_cookie_config.key, task_cookie_config.task_config_main_id, task_cookie_config.value form task_cookie_config
